articles.title: House-sized asteroid hurtling towards Earth for close approach, NASA reveals - HT Tech
articles.description: An asteroid, given the designation of Asteroid 2023 TC1, is on its way towards Earth and could make its closest approach to the planet today, October 13.
articles.content: With its advanced tech such as the NEOWISE telescope, Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA), Pans-STARRS1 and Catalina Sky Survey, NASA has revealed details about an asteroid that will … [+2144 chars]

articles.title: Massive solar space farm could be orbiting above the Earth by 2035 - Euronews
articles.description: The company says the solar space technology would produce more renewable energy than terrestrial equivalents.
articles.content:
The company says the solar space technology would produce more renewable energy than terrestrial equivalents.
